description: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components (CWE-1104) in the NuGet dependency components in AxxonSoft Axxon One VMS 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 on Windows allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code or bypass security features via exploitation of vulnerable third-party packages such as Google.Protobuf, DynamicData, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, and others.
